# Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

# Load file

```{r}
raw_game_data <- readxl::read_xlsx("raw_data/Recrutiment task - data set.xlsx")

glimpse(raw_game_data)
```

#Data cleaning
a. show number of unique values in every column 

```{r}
number_of_unique_values_in_col <- raw_game_data %>% 
  summarise_all(n_distinct) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = everything(),
               names_to = "n_distinct")


                

```
